means: 哈尔格萨（索马里西北部城市）

PerfectNetExp.abs: 作为这些区政府的长期发展合作伙伴,联合国人居署接到邀请函,参加在哈尔格萨(Hargeisa)、 Boroma、布拉奥(Burao)的就职仪式。 新住房项目把难民融入博萨索社区索马里.

auth_sentence.content: It was a dark and rainy night in Hargeisa.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a dark and rainy night in Hargeisa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a dark and rainy night in Hargeisa.

auth_sentence.content: Ports are located in Mogadishu, Bossasso, Berbera, and Hargeisa.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ports are located in Mogadishu, Bossasso, Berbera, and Hargeisa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ports are located in Mogadishu, Bossasso, Berbera, and Hargeisa.

auth_sentence.content: Today, if you go to Hargeisa, it's been entirely reconstructed and expanded way beyond its original limits.
